short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Made by @jharohit. Auto-saves your prompts on Google AI Studio every 5 seconds, pausing during overlays and resuming seamlessly.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
What "Auto Save Prompt for Google AI Studio" Does
==========================================
"Auto Save Prompt for Google AI Studio" is a Chrome extension that automatically saves your work on Google AI Studio every 5 seconds. This ensures that your progress is consistently preserved, preventing data loss from unexpected events like crashes or accidental page reloads.

Key Features
============
Automatic Saving:
- The extension triggers the "Save prompt" button every 5 seconds, ensuring your work is always up-to-date.

Intelligent Pausing:
- It detects active overlays on the page and pauses the auto-save process to avoid conflicts, resuming once the overlay is dismissed.

Seamless Integration:
- Designed exclusively for Google AI Studio, the extension works automatically without any additional setup.

Why Users Should Install It
======================
Protect Your Work:
- Safeguard your progress by automating the save process, eliminating the risk of losing unsaved work.

Boost Productivity:
- Focus on your creative tasks without worrying about manually saving your work, leading to a more efficient workflow.

Reduce Anxiety:
- Enjoy peace of mind knowing your work is continuously saved and protected from unforeseen disruptions.

Conclusion
==========
"Auto Save Prompt for Google AI Studio" is an essential tool for anyone using Google AI Studio. By automating the save process and intelligently handling overlays, it ensures your work is secure and your workflow remains uninterrupted. Install it today to enhance your productivity and protect your valuable work on Google AI Studio!
